name: Erased (William Zollman)
description:
You're an eraser who must escape the recycling factory.  Don't get spotted by the reanimated recyclables that are searching for you.

Your one battery is your key.  Choose wisely when to use it to power your flashlight or to power the puzzles that let you escape.

*48-hour Game Jam
Code - William Zollman
Art- Alex Tarnowski
